sentences.english: The police arrested one principal criminal and two accomplices.

sentences.english: The principal criminal was sentenced to life imprisonment.

sentences.english: And there is more fall-out today over Thursday's release of a Lockerbie bomber.

sentences.english: Zhao Pengyun, the chief culprit, was sentenced to serve 15 years in jail and also fined RMB300.34m.
